publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3290 Pauline McNeill: Hunterian Museum and Art Galleryâ€”That the Parliament congratulates the Hunterian Museum and Art Gallery at the University of Glasgow on its ranking for its collection amongst the top three in the Scottish Museums Council National Audit.
